original_text: He will chase out the people of those nations, one at a time. He will not let you destroy them all immediately. If you did that, wild animals would become so many that they would be a danger to you.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와께서 이 민족들을 네 앞에서 조금씩 쫓아내시리니 너는 그들을 급히 멸하지 말라 들짐승이 번성하여 너를 해할까 하노라

sentences.original_text: He will chase out the people of those nations
He will not let you destroy them all immediately
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너희가 그들을 모두 즉시 멸망시키지 않게 하실 것이다

sentences.original_text: wild animals would become so many
that they would be a danger to you
